air_processors.doc: Devices that produce and recycle breathable air in enclosed environments.

grain.doc: Basic staple crops (wheat, corn, etc.) for food production.

fruit_and_veg.doc: Fresh produce (fruits, vegetables) with higher spoilage rates.

animal_meat.doc: Various animal-derived meats, typically requiring cold storage.

liquid_oxygen.doc: O2 in liquid form, used for life support or industrial processes.

consumer_goods.doc: General household or personal items for daily use.

medicines.doc: Medical supplies, could include drugs or first-aid kits.

hand_weapons.doc: Personal arms or sidearms, short-range in nature.

narcotics.doc: Illegal or regulated substances with high value and high risk.
